title: New Testament
description: Study the life of Jesus and early church through New Testament readings

lessons.title: The Gospel Begins
lessons.content: We begin our New Testament journey with Matthew's genealogy of Jesus, showing His royal lineage and God's faithfulness to His promises.
reflectionQuestions: What does this genealogy tell us about God's faithfulness?
How do you see God's plan unfolding through generations?
lessons.practicalApplication: Consider God's faithfulness in your own family history and how He has worked through generations to bring you to this point.
